## Speaker
Chen Wei

### Theme
Heat Equation and Heat Kernel

### Abstract
Beginning with the heat equation, we present a systematic treatment of the theory of heat kernels, their asymptotic expansions, and computational techniques. We then turn to Dirac-type operators and show, via the supertrace of the heat kernel, how the analytic index coincides with the manifold's topological invariants.
